title: 02/18/22 DPS Hour 1  - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/18/22 DPS Hour 1  - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Jason discuss the Rams' championship week and the storylines that have unfolded since L.A. won the Super Bowl, including the unfortunate incident with the Staffords and a photographer who was injured in a fall. NBA writer Michael Lee joins the guys to talk about the impact Anthony Davis's latest injury will have on the Lakers and to talk about the drama that played out in Brooklyn with Kevin Durant and James Harden. Plus, Doug and Jason debate the relevance of the winter olympics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
